A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unbelievably disappointing overall. Whether you're a lifelong Star Wars fan\, or new to this story\, this was not a worthy installment. The pace is grossly flawed\, the plot is not compelling\, it diminishes almost all the mystery and intrigue setup in Episode 7\, and it's too long. A good 30 mins could have been trimmed from this film. There was an overwhelming amount of out-of-place comic relief\, and not enough tension to compensate. Worst of all it does a massive disservice to many of the characters in previous films.
